tasks.title: Aadhaar Card Registration
tasks.description: Register for a new Aadhaar card or update existing details.
required_documents: Proof of Identity (e.g., Passport, PAN Card, Voter ID)
Proof of Address (e.g., Utility Bill, Bank Statement)
Proof of Date of Birth (e.g., Birth Certificate)

steps: Visit the UIDAI official portal.
Fill in the online application form.
Schedule an appointment at the nearest Aadhaar Enrollment Center.
Visit the center with original documents for biometric authentication.
Visit the nearest Aadhaar Enrollment Center.
Fill out the application form available at the center.
Submit original documents for verification.
Provide biometric details (fingerprints, iris scan).

tasks.title: PAN Card Application
tasks.description: Apply for a new PAN card or make corrections to existing details.
required_documents: Proof of Identity (e.g., Passport, Voter ID)
Proof of Address (e.g., Utility Bill, Bank Statement)

steps: Visit the NSDL or UTIITSL portal.
Select the application type (Form 49A for Indian citizens).
Fill in the online application form.
Upload scanned copies of required documents.
Pay the application fee online.
Download and print Form 49A from the NSDL website.
Fill out the form manually.
Attach passport-size photograph and self-attested copies of documents.
Submit the form at the nearest PAN center.

tasks.title: Passport Application
tasks.description: Apply for a new passport or renew an existing one.
required_documents: Proof of Identity (e.g., Aadhaar, Voter ID)
Proof of Address (e.g., Utility Bill, Bank Statement)
Proof of Date of Birth (e.g., Birth Certificate)

steps: Visit the Passport Seva Portal.
Register and log in to your account.
Fill in the online application form.
Pay the application fee online.
Schedule an appointment at the nearest Passport Seva Kendra.
Download the passport application form from the Passport Seva Portal.
Fill out the form manually.
Attach passport-size photographs and self-attested copies of documents.
Submit the form at the nearest Passport Seva Kendra.

tasks.title: Marriage Registration
tasks.description: Register a marriage under the Special Marriage Act or respective state laws.
required_documents: Proof of Identity of both parties
Proof of Address of both parties

steps: Visit the official marriage registration portal of your state.
Fill in the online application form.
Upload scanned copies of required documents.
Pay the registration fee online.
Schedule an appointment for document verification.
Visit the local sub-registrar's office.
Fill out the marriage registration form.
Submit original documents for verification.
Provide passport-size photographs.
Pay the registration fee.

tasks.title: GST Registration
tasks.description: Register for Goods and Services Tax (GST) for business operations.
required_documents: Proof of Business Registration or Incorporation Certificate
Identity and Address Proof of Promoters/Directors with photographs

steps: Visit the GST Portal.
Click on 'Services' > 'Registration' > 'New Registration'.
Fill in the required details in the application form.
Upload scanned copies of required documents.
Submit the application for processing.
Currently, GST registration is only available online through the official portal.

tasks.title: Voter ID Registration
tasks.description: Register to vote in Indian elections by obtaining a Voter ID card.
required_documents: Proof of Address (e.g., Utility Bill, Bank Statement)

steps: Visit the National Voter's Service Portal.
Fill in Form 6 for new voter registration.
Upload scanned copies of required documents.
Submit the application for processing.
Visit the local Electoral Registration Office.
Fill out Form 6 for new voter registration.
Submit original documents for verification.
Provide passport-size photographs.

tasks.title: Ration Card Application
tasks.description: Apply for a new ration card or update existing details.
required_documents: Proof of Identity (e.g., Aadhaar, Voter ID)
Proof of Address (e.g., Utility Bill, Bank Statement)

steps: Visit the official ration card portal of your state.
Register and log in to your account.
Fill in the online application form.
Upload scanned copies of required documents.
Submit the application for processing.
Visit the local ration shop or government office.
Obtain and fill out the ration card application form.
Submit original documents for verification.
Provide passport-size photographs.

tasks.title: Driving License Application
tasks.description: Apply for a new driving license or renew an existing one.
required_documents: Proof of Address (e.g., Utility Bill, Bank Statement)

steps: Visit the official RTO Parivahan Sewa portal.
Fill in the online application form.
Upload scanned copies of required documents.
Pay the application fee online.
Schedule an appointment for driving test.
Visit the nearest RTO office.
Submit the filled application form with originals.
Provide passport-size photographs and learner's license (if applicable).
Take the driving test and submit biometric data if required.

tasks.title: Property Registration (Sale/Lease)
tasks.description: Register the sale, purchase, or lease of immovable property.

steps: Check if e-registration is available in your state.
Calculate stamp duty and pay online if applicable.
Book slot with Sub-Registrar.
Upload documents and submit online.
Visit office for final signing.
Visit Sub-Registrar office with original documents.
Pay stamp duty / registration fee.
Sign deeds in presence of registrar.
Receive registered property documents.

tasks.title: Private Limited Company Registration
tasks.description: Register a private limited company under MCA regulations.

steps: Apply via MCA SPICe+ portal.
Reserve company name and upload required documents.
Pay registration fee online.
Obtain Certificate of Incorporation, DIN, PAN/GST (optional).
Company registration must be done online through MCA portal.

tasks.title: FSSAI Registration / License
tasks.description: Obtain Food Safety and Standards Authority of India registration/license.
required_documents: ID and address proof of applicant

steps: Apply via FSSAI online portal.
Upload required documents.
Pay fee online and obtain license number.
Visit local Food Safety Office.
Submit application and required documents in person.
Receive FSSAI license.

tasks.title: Income Certificate
tasks.description: Apply for an income certificate (Delhi example, Aadhaar mandatory).
required_documents: Proof of birth for minors (Birth Certificate/School ID)

steps: Visit Delhi Revenue Department portal.
Fill in application and authenticate via Aadhaar.
Submit online and download certificate.
Visit Revenue Office with Aadhaar/enrollment slip and ID.
Fill application form and submit documents in person.
Receive certificate.

tasks.title: Rent Agreement Registration
tasks.description: Register a rent agreement between landlord and tenant.
required_documents: ID proofs of tenant and landlord

steps: Use state e-registration/e-stamp portals.
Pay fees online and book sub-registrar slot.
Submit documents and register agreement.
Prepare agreement on stamp paper.
Visit sub-registrar office with parties and witnesses.
Submit documents, pay registration fees, get agreement registered.

tasks.title: MSME (Udyam) Registration
tasks.description: Register a micro/small/medium enterprise to obtain a Udyam Registration Number.

steps: Visit the Udyam Registration portal.
Authenticate with Aadhaar OTP.
Enter PAN, business details, and bank information.
Submit to generate Udyam Registration Number.
Udyam registration is available only online.

tasks.title: Importer Exporter Code (IEC)
tasks.description: Obtain IEC for import/export activities in India.

steps: Register on the DGFT portal.
Fill IEC application and upload documents.
Pay the fee and submit.
Download IEC once approved.
IEC application is processed online via DGFT.

tasks.title: GeM Seller Registration
tasks.description: Register as a seller on Government e-Marketplace (GeM) to sell to government buyers.

steps: Go to GeM portal and select 'Seller' sign-up.
Verify Aadhaar and email/mobile.
Provide business, bank, and tax details.
Complete profile and list products/services.
GeM registration is entirely online.

tasks.title: Trademark Registration
tasks.description: Apply to register a brand name/logo under the Trade Marks Act.
required_documents: User affidavit/proof of prior use (if claiming prior use)

steps: Create account on the IP India TM e-filing portal.
Conduct search (optional) and prepare application.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Track examination, opposition, and registration status.
Visit the nearest Trade Marks Registry office.
Submit Form with required documents and fees.

tasks.title: Patent Application Filing
tasks.description: File provisional/complete specification to protect an invention.

steps: Register on IP India patent e-filing portal.
Prepare forms and specification.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Request examination and respond to office actions.
Submit physical forms and specification at Patent Office.

tasks.title: Industrial Design Registration
tasks.description: Register the visual design/shape/pattern of an article.

steps: Apply via IP India Designs e-filing.
Upload representations and details.
Pay fees and track examination.
Submit design application at the Designs Office.

tasks.title: EPFO Employer Registration
tasks.description: Register establishment with Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation.

steps: Sign up on EPFO Unified Employer portal.
Enter establishment details and upload documents.
Submit for approval; obtain establishment ID.
Registration is online via EPFO portal.

tasks.title: ESIC Employer Registration
tasks.description: Enroll establishment under Employees’ State Insurance for employee benefits.

steps: Create account on ESIC portal.
Fill establishment and employee details.
Upload documents and submit to get ESIC code.
Visit local ESIC branch office.
Submit application with documents.

tasks.title: Labour License (CLRA) Registration
tasks.description: Obtain registration/license under the Contract Labour (Regulation & Abolition) Act.

steps: Apply via Shram Suvidha Portal.
Fill forms, upload documents, and pay fees.
Track application and download license.
Submit application at Labour Department office with documents.

tasks.title: Shops & Establishment Registration
tasks.description: Register a shop/commercial establishment under state law.

steps: Use your state’s labour/eDistrict portal.
Fill application, upload documents, pay fee.
Download registration certificate.
Visit local Labour Department office.
Submit form with documents and fees.

tasks.title: Professional Tax Registration (Employer/Professionals)
tasks.description: Register for state professional tax as employer/individual, where applicable.

steps: Apply on respective state's commercial tax portal.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Receive registration credentials.
Apply at the Professional Tax office with documents.

tasks.title: Municipal Trade License
tasks.description: Obtain a trade/health license from the local municipal authority.

steps: Apply on your city’s ULB portal.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Schedule inspection if required.
Submit application at Municipal Corporation office.
Provide documents; attend inspection if scheduled.

tasks.title: Birth Certificate
tasks.description: Register a birth and obtain the birth certificate.

steps: Use the Civil Registration System (CRS) portal if supported.
Submit details and request certificate.
Download or collect certificate as instructed.
Apply at Municipal/Gram Panchayat office.
Submit hospital record and proofs.
Collect certificate after processing.

tasks.title: Death Certificate
tasks.description: Register a death and obtain the death certificate.
required_documents: Medical certificate of cause of death

steps: Apply via CRS or state municipal portal.
Upload required documents and submit.
Download certificate or collect as directed.
Apply at Municipal/Gram Panchayat office.
Submit documents and pay fees if any.
Collect certificate after processing.

tasks.title: Caste Certificate (SC/ST/OBC)
tasks.description: Obtain caste certificate for availing reservations/benefits.

steps: Apply via your state's eDistrict portal.
Upload documents and submit.
Download certificate when approved.
Submit application to Tehsildar/SDM office.
Provide proofs for verification.

tasks.title: Domicile Certificate
tasks.description: Obtain domicile/residence certificate from state authorities.
required_documents: Address proof and residence duration proof

steps: Apply on state eDistrict portal.
Upload documents and submit.
Download certificate after approval.
Apply at Tehsildar/SDM office with documents.

tasks.title: EWS Certificate
tasks.description: Get Economically Weaker Section certificate for eligible candidates.

steps: Apply on state eDistrict portal.
Upload documents and submit.
Track status and download certificate.
Apply at Tehsildar/SDM office.
Submit documents and collect certificate on approval.

tasks.title: UDID (Unique Disability ID) Card
tasks.description: Register for a national disability ID card and certificate.
required_documents: Disability medical certificate/reports from authorized hospital

steps: Register on the UDID portal.
Fill application and upload medical documents.
Track status and download e-UDID.
Apply via designated district hospital/medical board.

tasks.title: ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account) ID
tasks.description: Create a digital health ID to link health records.

steps: Visit ABHA portal/app.
Authenticate via mobile/Aadhaar.
Generate ABHA number and download card.
Create ABHA at participating hospitals/health centers.

tasks.title: Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY) e-Card
tasks.description: Check eligibility and generate PM-JAY e-card for health coverage.

steps: Check eligibility on PM-JAY portal.
Complete eKYC and generate e-card if eligible.
Visit nearest CSC/PM-JAY helpdesk for assisted registration.

tasks.title: Organ Donor Pledge (NOTTO)
tasks.description: Pledge to donate organs and receive a donor card.

steps: Register on NOTTO portal.
Fill pledge form and submit.
Download donor card.
Pledge at participating hospitals/NGOs.

tasks.title: Blood Donor Registration (eRaktKosh)
tasks.description: Register as a voluntary blood donor and find donation camps.

steps: Create account on eRaktKosh.
Complete donor profile.
Book donation slot/camp as available.
Register at nearest blood bank.

tasks.title: National Pension System (eNPS) Registration
tasks.description: Open an NPS account and get PRAN.

steps: Go to eNPS portal.
Choose Aadhaar/PAN-based registration.
Complete KYC, upload photo/signature, and pay initial contribution.
Visit Point of Presence (POP) for assisted registration.

tasks.title: eShram (Unorganized Workers) Registration
tasks.description: Register unorganized workers for a national database and benefits.

steps: Register on eShram portal.
Verify with OTP and fill details.
Download eShram card.
Visit nearest CSC for assisted registration.

tasks.title: PM-KISAN Registration
tasks.description: Register eligible farmers for PM-KISAN income support.

steps: Apply on PM-KISAN portal as 'New Farmer'.
Enter Aadhaar, land, and bank details.
Submit and track status.
Apply via local agriculture office/CSC.

tasks.title: PMFBY Crop Insurance Enrollment
tasks.description: Enroll for Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana.

steps: Register on PMFBY portal.
Select season/crop and upload documents.
Pay premium and submit.
Enroll via bank/CSC/Agriculture office.

tasks.title: Police Clearance Certificate (PCC)
tasks.description: Apply for PCC, typically required for immigration/employment abroad.

steps: Apply via Passport Seva portal.
Pay fees and schedule appointment.
Attend appointment and police verification.
In some states, apply at local police commissioner's office.

tasks.title: International Driving Permit (IDP)
tasks.description: Obtain IDP for driving in foreign countries.

steps: Apply via Parivahan (Sarathi) services.
Upload documents, pay fees, and book appointment if required.
Collect IDP from RTO or receive by post.
Apply at Regional Transport Office with documents and fee.

tasks.title: Vehicle Ownership Transfer (RC Transfer)
tasks.description: Transfer ownership of a motor vehicle to a new owner.

steps: Initiate transfer on Vahan portal.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Submit vehicle for inspection if called.
Submit Forms and documents at RTO.
Pay fees and collect updated RC.

tasks.title: FASTag Purchase & Activation
tasks.description: Buy and activate FASTag for electronic toll collection.

steps: Purchase FASTag via IHMCL/issuer bank portal.
Upload KYC and vehicle details.
Activate and link wallet/account.
Buy at toll plaza POS or bank branch.
Provide KYC and vehicle details for activation.

tasks.title: TAN Application (Tax Deduction Account Number)
tasks.description: Obtain TAN for entities deducting TDS.

steps: Apply on NSDL-TIN portal for TAN.
Fill Form 49B and submit.
Receive TAN allotment.
Submit physical Form 49B at TIN-FC.

tasks.title: Right to Information (RTI) Online Application
tasks.description: File RTI to seek information from public authorities.

steps: File RTI on the RTI Online portal (for participating authorities).
Pay fee online and submit.
Track and receive response.
Submit RTI application to PIO of the department with fee (IPO/DD).

tasks.title: Public Grievance (CPGRAMS) Filing
tasks.description: Submit grievances to Central/State government departments.

steps: Register/login on CPGRAMS portal.
File grievance with details and attachments.
Track status and receive resolution.
Submit written grievance to the concerned department’s grievance cell.

tasks.title: DPIIT Startup Recognition
tasks.description: Get recognized as a Startup by DPIIT for benefits and incentives.

steps: Register on Startup India portal.
Complete profile and submit recognition application.
Receive DPIIT recognition certificate on approval.
Recognition process is online.

tasks.title: NGO Darpan Registration
tasks.description: Register NGO/VO with NITI Aayog for scheme participation.

steps: Sign up on NGO Darpan portal.
Enter organization and key functionary details.
Submit for NGO ID generation.
Registration is online on NGO Darpan.

tasks.title: FCRA Registration (NGOs)
tasks.description: Register to receive foreign contributions under FCRA.

steps: Apply on FCRA online portal.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Track inspection/approval.
FCRA applications are processed online.

tasks.title: IEC Modification/Update
tasks.description: Modify existing Importer Exporter Code details.

steps: Login to DGFT portal.
Edit IEC profile and upload proofs.
Submit and download updated IEC.
IEC modifications are done online.

tasks.title: MCA ROC Annual Filing (Companies)
tasks.description: File annual returns/financials (e.g., AOC-4, MGT-7) with MCA.

steps: Prepare e-forms using MCA utilities.
Upload forms on MCA portal with DSC.
Pay fees and download SRN/acknowledgements.
ROC filings are online on MCA portal.

tasks.title: BIS Certification (ISI/CRS) – Basic Application
tasks.description: Apply for BIS certification where mandatory for products.

steps: Register on BIS Manakonline portal.
Submit application with test reports.
Schedule inspection if required and obtain license.
Submit application at BIS branch office with documents.

tasks.title: Building Plan Approval (Urban Local Body)
tasks.description: Get municipal approval for building plans before construction.

steps: Apply via city’s online building plan approval system.
Upload plans and pay scrutiny fees.
Respond to queries and obtain approval.
Submit plans at municipal town planning department.
Attend site inspections and collect approval.

tasks.title: Fire NOC (Commercial Establishments)
tasks.description: Obtain Fire Safety NOC for commercial buildings/establishments.

steps: Apply on the state fire services portal (if available).
Upload plans and compliance details.
Schedule inspection and receive NOC.
Apply at District Fire Office with plans.
Facilitate site inspection and collect NOC.

tasks.title: Pollution Control Consent (CTE/CTO)
tasks.description: Obtain Consent to Establish/Operate from State Pollution Control Board.

steps: Apply via state SPCB online portal.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Facilitate inspection and receive consent order.
Submit application at SPCB office with documents.

tasks.title: DigiLocker Account Creation
tasks.description: Create DigiLocker to access and store digital documents issued by government.

steps: Sign up on DigiLocker portal/app.
Verify mobile and optionally link Aadhaar.
Fetch government-issued documents.
DigiLocker signup is online.

tasks.title: e-Sanad Document Attestation/Apostille
tasks.description: Online attestation/apostille of personal/educational documents.

steps: Register on e-Sanad portal.
Upload documents and pay fees.
Download attested/apostilled documents when ready.
Use designated collection centers if required.

tasks.title: National Career Service (NCS) Jobseeker Registration
tasks.description: Register on NCS portal for job search and career services.

steps: Create account on NCS portal.
Complete profile and preferences.
Search/apply for jobs and training.
Register at Employment Exchange/NCS center.

tasks.title: Apprenticesship_napship Registration (NAPS)
tasks.description: Register as apprentice or employer under National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme.

steps: Sign up on Apprenticeship India portal.
Complete profile and KYC.
Apply for apprenticeships or post opportunities.
Visit ITI/skill centers for assisted registration.

tasks.title: Indian Railways Parcel and Luggage Transport
tasks.description: Transport personal or commercial items legally via Indian Railways by booking them as luggage (with passenger) or parcel (without passenger).
required_documents: Invoice or goods declaration (for commercial parcels)

steps: Visit Indian Railways Parcel Management System (PMS) website.
Register and provide sender/receiver details.
Enter parcel/luggage details and generate booking request.
Pay charges online and obtain Railway Receipt (RR).
Track status online until delivery.
Visit the Luggage/Parcel Office at the railway station.
Pack goods securely as per railway rules.
Submit booking form with ID proof (and train ticket for luggage).
Pay charges and receive Luggage Receipt (LR) or Railway Receipt (RR).
Collect goods at destination parcel office using receipt and ID.
